question: What is the theme of the 2017 International Migrants Day (IMD)?
option2: Safe Migration in a World on the Move
answer: Safe Migration in a World on the Move
explanation: The United Nations (UN) International Migrants Day is observed every year on December 18 to recognize the efforts, contributions, and rights of workers and members of their families worldwide. The 2017 theme is \"Safe Migration in a World on the Move\"
